Custom VIP 2022 US Grand Prix Packages

Our 2022 US Grand Prix packages are tailor-made for each guest so you can experience the race the way you want. Our Sports Travel Specialists will collaborate with you to design a bespoke travel package with luxe hotels in Austin, your choice of race viewing including premium grandstand seating and exclusive hospitality paddocks, plus much more. For the ultimate US Grand Prix experience, we recommend the VIP treatment of the paddocks. These exclusive hospitality venues provide ideal sightlines of the race, wonderful food and drink, and extras like pit tours and driver appearances. It’s the perfect way to experience this thrilling event.

In 2022, the US Grand Prix will celebrate its 10th anniversary in Austin, making it an ideal year to attend. Whether you’re traveling with friends or family, or planning a corporate event, we will curate a race experience that is absolutely perfect. Complete 2022 United States Grand Prix packages are available from $6,295 (premium grandstand seating) or $12,155 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 US Grand Prix

Since it was added to the Formula 1 calendar in 2012, Austin has proven itself to be an exemplary host for the US Grand Prix. For F1 fans, it’s the race itself that’s the highlight, but the wonderful state-of-the-art facilities at the Circuit of the Americas takes it to another level and is a big reason this track is one of the most popular with drivers. Then there’s the city itself; Austin boasts great live music, a vibrant food scene and electric nightlife. Throw in some famous Texan hospitality and you’ve got a weekend that won’t soon be forgotten.
